caption.title: SLP mean composites for eastern Mediterranean synoptic systems.
caption.p: SLP composites for the top and bottom five percentiles of the d and Î¸ distributions ( A to D) and the CL, High, PT, and RST synoptic systems ( E to H). The values are provided as deviations in Pa from the mean SLP value of each composite. The corresponding absolute SLP patterns for the synoptic systems are shown in fig. S3.
